metadata.title: CVE-2022-49024 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:can: m_can: pci: add missing m_can_class_free_dev() in probe/remove methodsIn m_can_pci_remove() and error handling path of m_can_pci_probe(),m_can_class_free_dev() should be called to free resource allocated bym_can_class_allocate_dev(), otherwise there will be memleak.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
